item.title: Ego Fading, Direction of Evolution
item.description: Remembering a concept from the book Sapiens (paraphrasing): Ape hierarchy only existed in small groups with a limit (150 or so) with a dominant leader (alpha). This applies to humans as well, but we were able so surpass the threshold with myths and better communication. And a ET’s ðŸ‘½ definition of the ego: A complete and total identification with form - a thought form or a physical form - as who you are
